item.title: Systems At Facebook Scale
item.description: Wow, this is one of the most practical, technical talks I’ve seen in a while - super good!

item.title: Kelsey Hightower on Kubernetes
item.description: Kelsey Hightower, very funny, very good practical demo of Kubernetes..

item.title: And It All Went Horribly Wrong
item.description: Bryan Cantrill being funny as hell. "Bryan Cantrill discusses debugging production systems using post-mortem debugging and dynamic instrumentation, with a bit of history and an introduction to useful debugging tools."i
